purpose: Reusable interpretation units that perform motive weighting, conflict analysis, emotional decoding, identity filtering, and prediction synthesis.

units.description: Resolves dimensional contradictions using the kernel's access priority hierarchy.
logic: Identify conflicting signals across dimensions.
Apply access_priority: stress overrides > survival > conflict > emotion > reward > identity.
Suppress lower-priority contradictions.
Return resolved state object.

units.description: Assigns weights to survival and reward motives to determine core and secondary motives.
logic: Read D1 and D2 indicators.
Apply survival override if threat is active.
If reward axis aligns with identity, increase weight.
If emotional suppression is present, adjust weights downward for expressed motives.
Output weighted motive array.

units.description: Predicts which conflict pattern activates based on motives and emotional style.
logic: Start with D3 conflict pattern.
Modify based on D1 threat axis.
Modify based on emotional externalizer/internalizer pattern.
Apply stress override if conditions met.
Output conflict behavior object.

units.description: Interprets emotional timing, expression, suppression, and processing trajectory.
logic: If suppressor: delay emotion, reduce outward expression.
If expresser: amplify immediate emotion.
If internalizer: increase narrative rumination.
If sensitive: increase volatility and hyper-awareness.
Apply stress overrides for emotional flooding or shutdown.
Output emotional profile object.

units.description: Applies identity logic to interpret meaning-making, justification, and reaction narratives.
logic: Read identity axis (performance, relational, autonomy, morality, aesthetic, role).
Interpret how identity reframes or reinterprets emotional and conflict signals.
If identity threatened: amplify protective behaviors.
Modify narrative interpretation accordingly.
Output identity-modified model object.

units.description: Synthesizes all interpreted units into short-term and long-term behavioral predictions.
logic: Integrate weighted motives, conflict pattern, emotional style, and identity filter.
Generate predictions related to stress behavior, relational dynamics, risk markers, decision making, and consistency of traits.
Encode predictions into matrix form for downstream narrative generation.
Output prediction_matrix object.

units.description: Converts predictions into human-readable, structured psychological reports.
logic: Take prediction_matrix and match sections to report_structure template.
Translate psychological logic into accessible language.
Maintain internal consistency and avoid contradictions.
Output structured narrative object.
